name: insight
description: Web app for time series exploration

scripts.build: browserify -t [ babelify --presets [ latest react ]  --plugins [ transform-object-rest-spread ] ] app/js/app.js -o server/static/js/bundle.js
scripts.watch: watchify -t [ babelify --presets [ latest react ] --plugins [ transform-object-rest-spread ] ] app/js/app.js -o server/static/js/bundle.js

author: Charles Lovering & Cuong Nguyen
